member.name: M:Bang.Revit.Elements.WarningTools.GetWarnings(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This node will get the warnings for the current document. Revit 2018 and up only!

member.name: M:Bang.Revit.Elements.Warning.Description(Autodesk.Revit.DB.FailureMessage)
member.summary: Provides the full description of the warning.
member.param: The warning to get the description of.

member.name: M:Bang.Revit.Elements.Warning.Severity(Autodesk.Revit.DB.FailureMessage)
member.summary: Possibles severity messages include, Warning, Error and Document Corruption.
member.param: The warning to get the severity of.

member.name: M:Bang.Revit.Elements.Warning.FailingElements(Autodesk.Revit.DB.FailureMessage)
member.summary: Retrieves the elements that are failing for that warning instance.
member.param: The warning to get the failing elements for.
member.returns: All of the failing elements for that specific warning.

member.name: M:Bang.Revit.Elements.Warning.ById(System.String)
member.summary: Create Performance Adviser Rule by Id
